GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.10.153
GSD.description:
fs/binfmt_elf: Fix memory leak in load_elf_binary()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.153 by commit 706215300411d48db6b51a5832b872632a84bbc1, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 0693ffebcfe5ac7b31f63ad54587007f7d96fb7b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: fs/binfmt_elf: Fix memory leak in load_elf_binary()
